name: Mobizou
overview:
Mobizou enables merchants to easily create, distribute and engage with their customers via targeted marketing campaigns that will both drive foot traffic to the store and increase customer purchases.

Via a SaaS e-marketing platform, Mobizou targets small and medium sized businesses providing an intuitive interface to create online content such as mobile coupons, surveys and ads. Content is seamlessly distributed, with no effort from the retailer, across multiple channels, namely: Twitter, Facebook, Web, Mobile web, SMS, and Email. All customer interactions and engagement is tracked in real-time via our online analytics. With this info, merchants are easily able to make adjustments to their campaigns on the fly.

So how does this help the merchant? It dramatically reduces customer acquisition costs, increases foot traffic from re-occurring customers, and significantly decreases the amount of work as everything is done through a single interface.
